predicate.note: Frames file for 'whine' based on sentences in brown.

example.name: straight intransitive
example.text: Wires whined as a cold November blast rocked the silver wings, but the engine roar was reassuring to the pilot bundled in the open cockpit.
example.arg: as a cold November blast rocked the silver wings

example.name: adjectival
example.text: He would no longer have to see that fat face, hear that whining voice.

example.name: with aspects of motion
example.text: When it was followed by a second , whining [*] even closer, Cobb swerved sharply aside into a depression.
